snippet: A bill introduced by the New York City Council to limit the use of plastic bags is a good start.
abstract: Editorial supports bill introduced by the New York City Council to limit the use of plastic grocery bags, which spend an eternity as all-but-indestructible trash; holds ten cent charge is a good start, but that city must ultimately find a way to rid itself of a bad habit that prizes convenience over litter and environmental damage.
lead_paragraph: A bill introduced by the New York City Council to limit the use of plastic bags is a good start.

headline.print_headline: Ten Cents a Bag? That’s About Right
headline.main: Ten Cents a Bag? That’s About Right
